name: TRex Reasoner
tagline: An explanation enabled reasoner for Ontology Learning
body:
### TRex - Terminological Reasoning with Explanations
This is the homepage of the TRex reasoner. TRex is a reasoner for a subset of OWL2 and particularly suited to compute explanations for incoherences in ontologies generated by means of ontology learning.

### Availability
TRex will be available on this page soon.

### Authors and Contributors
TRex is a project of Daniel Fleischhacker (@dfleischhacker), Christian Meilicke and Johanna VÃ¶lker.
